Thunderstorm with light rain. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Thunderstorm with rain. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Thunderstorm with heavy rain. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Light thunderstorms. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Thunderstorms. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Heavy thunderstorms. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Scattered thunderstorms. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Thunderstorms with light drizzle. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Thunderstorms with drizzles. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Thunderstorms with heavy drizzles. Stay safe, do not photograph at this time.
Light drizzles. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Drizzles. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Heavy drizzles. It is probably not advisable to photograph at this time, but if you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects.
Light drizzles. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Drizzles. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Heavy drizzles. It is probably not advisable to photograph at this time, but if you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects.
Drizzles. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Light rain. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Moderate rain. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Heavy rain. It is probably not advisable to photograph at this time, but if you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects.
Very heavy rain. It is probably not advisable to photograph at this time, but if you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects.
Extreme rain. Photography is not advisble.
Freezing rain. Do you really want to be photographing at this time?
Light rain showers. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Rain showers. For portrait photography, try backlighting the subject for an interesting effect. For landscape photography, you may get a very cool mean looking sky.
Heavy rain showers. It is probably not advisable to photograph at this time, but if you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects.
Light Snow. Stay warm! If you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects. The snow on the ground will act as a big reflector, providing nice light on your subject.
Snow. Stay warm! If you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects. The snow on the ground will act as a big reflector, providing nice light on your subject.
Heavy snow. Stay warm! If you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects. The snow on the ground will act as a big reflector, providing nice light on your subject.
Sleet. Do you really want to be taking photos at this time?
Snow showers. Stay warm! If you are doing portrait photography, try back lighting the subject for interesting effects. The snow on the ground will act as a big reflector, providing nice light on your subject.
Mist. Not optimal for photography, but if you are doing portrait photography try back lighting with a flash.
Smoke. Play it safe and steer clear of forest fires.
Haze. What a horrible condition! Not optimal for photography.
Sand or Dust Whirls. Not recommended to use your camera outdoors unless it is insured.
Fog. This could be interesting. Get creative!
Clear sky. Bring fill flash or diffusers for portrait photography. For landscape photography, the sky will probably be boring.
Few clouds. May prove challenging for portrait photography with the light changing very frequently. Bring a fill flash or diffusers. For landscape photography the weather is ideal, but bring a polarizing filter to make the clouds really pop, or a graduated ND filter for sunset.
Scattered clouds. May prove challenging for portrait photography with the light changing frequently. The sky should be interesting for landscape photography. Bring a polarizing filter to make the clouds really pop, or a graduated ND filter for sunset.
Broken clouds. Should be good for portrait photography, but may be boring for landscape photography.
Overcast. Perfect for easy portrait photography with soft light, but usually boring for landscape photography.
